summary: A look at the life of activist, musician, and cultural icon Kathleen Hanna, who formed the punk band Bikini Kill and pioneered the "riot grrrl" movement of the 1990s.
cast: Kathleen Hanna|Tammy Rae Carland|Kathryn Wilcox|Tobi Vail|Billy Karren|Becca Albee|Corin Tucker|Allison Wolfe|Ann Powers|Lynn Breedlove|Sara Marcus|Carrie Brownstein|Joan Jett|Kim Gordon|Jennifer Baumgardner|Rebecca Walken|Anna Joy Springer|Adam Horovitz|Tamra Davis|Gloria Steinem|Tavi Gevinson|Johanna Fateman|Jocelyn Samson|Leo Galland
title: The Punk Singer
